title: How to punctuate an exclamation mark in dialogue - Quora

response.answer_text: You just put in an exclamation mark as per usual. “Go away!” she yelled. A period is replaced by a comma “Go away,” she said. But an exclamation mark and question mark don’t change.
In dialogue, if the exclamation is part of the quote, put it inside the quote marks. If the exclamation is the whole sentence and not just the quote, put it outside.
